description.default: Rows of wooden benches are arranged in a semi-circle facing a raised podium. The room buzzes with the energy of commerce. Traders, adventurers, and nobles whisper to one another, eyeing the goods on display. An Auctioneer stands at the podium, gavel in hand.

objects.description: A worn wooden podium where the auctioneer presides.
objects.name: podium
